Tender Title: East - A11 SB 6m Bottom to M11J9a Resurf - Coring & DCP
Tender Description:
Highways England are looking to appoint a supplier to conduct coring and DCP testing on a section of it's network in the East Region.

Please note, you will need to be a registered TST supplier to submit a bid for this survey. Further details can be obtained from nationaltst@highwaysengland.co.uk
Classification Description: Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work

Classification Description: Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work

Tender Title: Area 7 - A1 SB Newark to Gonerby Moor Pavement - Cores and DCP
Tender Description:
Highways England are looking to appoint a supplier to conduct coring, testing and DCP surveying on a section of it's network in the East Midlands Region.

Please note, you will need to be a registered TST supplier to submit a bid for this survey. Further details can be obtained from nationaltst@highwaysengland.co.uk. Additional appendices available upon invitation to tender.
Classification Description: Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work
